content.question: Which of the following is emphasized in the fourth paragraph?

choices.label: The challenges of an author’s desire for accurate representation
The ambivalence of an immigrant toward his new country
The persuasive power of an author’s imagination
The need for authors to be faithful to the past

content.answer: The challenges of an author’s desire for accurate representation

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe the line of reasoning and explain whether it supports an argument's overarching thesis.
